label: Botanical collection with images of plants similar to Dioscorides

note.value: Description by Agamemnon Tselikas, Nigel Wilson, Giulia Rossetto

Biliography: Wellmann M. 1958 (ed.), Pedanii Dioscuridis Anazarbei De Materia Medica Libri quinque, I–III, Berlin ; G. Boudalis, G. Rossetto, Colour Mapping of Sin. ar. NF 8 + Sin. ar. Rossetto, Classical Texts Among the Palimpsests of the Monastery of St. Catherine (Sinai): An Overview, in: New Light on Old Manuscripts: The Sinai Palimpsests and Other Advances in Palimpsest Studies, ed.
